articles.description:
Nov 17, 22:42 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved; we are not expecting any unexpected permission errors going forward. Please reach out through the API support portal if you have any remaining issues.
Nov 17, 21:00 PST
Monitoring - There was an incident that caused permission errors to be thrown for requests to a number of different API endpoints. It began around 9PM PST, and was resolved around 10PM PST. Any requests that failed during this time period can be retried.
articles.title: Permission Errors across Multiple Endpoints

articles.description:
Nov 10, 14:08 PST
Resolved - The incident has been resolved
Nov 10, 09:19 PST
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results. The get Reservations endpoint was recovered at 8:55 AM PDT.
Nov 10, 09:16 PST
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.
Nov 10, 07:52 PST
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue related to increased error rate on the reservation endpoints. The increase started around 7:05 AM PDT. We'll post updates as we have more information.
articles.title: 500 When Getting Reservations

articles.description:
Oct 24, 10:27 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved. The increase in 500 errors occurred between 4:00 a.m. and 7:00 a.m. PDT. Please reach out to us via the Support Portal if you are still experiencing 500 errors.
Oct 24, 05:40 PDT
Investigating - We are having a site wide issue causing 500 errors across all APIs. We are currently investigating, and we will post updates as we have more information.
articles.title: 500 Error Across All APIs

articles.description:
Oct 21, 16:03 PDT
Resolved - We have identified an issue with creating room amenity photos. The issue would cause POST requests to fail with either a 404 error or a 500 error. This issue approximately started from last Friday, October 14th, 2022. The photo creations are successful in most cases but the requests fail at a later stage resulting in error responses.
We have fixed this issue at 3:30pm PT today, but there can be duplicate photos created for room amenities during this time. We advise you to review room amenity photos and use the DELETE endpoint to remove duplicate photos.
We are sorry for the inconvenience.
articles.title: Requests to create room amenity photos failing (Listing Photos POST Request)

articles.description:
Nov 18, 15:44 PST
Update - We are seeing intermittent issues while purchasing phone numbers. We noticed that API requests to purchase numbers are timing out without an error code returned. Also, when clicking 'Buy Number' in console, the button spins before resetting back to 'Buy Number'. Our engineers are actively investigating the issue and we expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
Nov 18, 13:44 PST
Update - We are seeing intermittent issues while purchasing phone numbers. We noticed that API requests to purchase numbers are timing out without an error code returned. Also, when clicking 'Buy Number' in console, the button spins before resetting back to 'Buy Number'. Our engineers are actively investigating the issue and we expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
Nov 18, 12:46 PST
Update - We are seeing intermittent issues while purchasing phone numbers. We noticed that API requests to purchase numbers are timing out without an error code returned. Also, when clicking 'Buy Number' in console, the button spins before resetting back to 'Buy Number'. Our engineers are actively investigating the issue and we expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.
Nov 18, 12:22 PST
Investigating - Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with purchasing phone numbers Through Console and API. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.
articles.title: Intermittent Issues While Purchasing Phone Number Through Console or Using API

articles.description:
Nov 18, 11:10 PST
Resolved - We are no longer experiencing delivery report delays when sending to USA T-Mobile from Twilio long codes. This incident has been resolved.
Nov 18, 09:10 PST
Monitoring - We are observing recovery in delivery report delays when sending to USA T-Mobile from Twilio long codes. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
Nov 18, 09:04 PST
Update - We are continuing to work with our carrier partner to resolve delays in receiving message delivery reports when sending MMS to USA T-Mobile from Twilio long codes. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
Nov 18, 07:02 PST
Update - We are continuing to work with our carrier partner to resolve delays in receiving message delivery reports when sending MMS to USA T-Mobile from Twilio long codes. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
Nov 18, 06:02 PST
Investigating - We are experiencing delays in receiving message delivery reports when sending to USA T-Mobile from Twilio long codes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.
articles.title: MMS Delivery Report Delays when sending to USA T-Mobile over Twilio Long Codes

articles.description:
Incident began at 2022-11-14 18:50 and ended at 2022-11-14 19:27 (times are in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)).

Mini Incident Report

We apologize for the inconvenience this service disruption/outage may have caused. We would like to provide some information about this incident below. Please note, this information is based on our best knowledge at the time of posting and is subject to change as our investigation continues. If you have experienced impact outside of what is listed below, please reach out to Google Cloud Support using https://cloud.google.com/support or to Google Workspace Support using help article https://support.google.com/a/answer/1047213.

(All Times US/Pacific)

Google Workspace Impact Start: 14 November 2022 10:50

Google Workspace Impact End : 14 November 2022 11:27

Duration: 37 minutes

Google Cloud Platform Impact Start: 14 November 2022 10:50

Google Cloud Platform Impact End: 14 November 2022 11:38

Duration: 48 minutes

For more information about incident impact details, please refer: https://status.cloud.google.com/incidents/rjV26MkG41n1YSAWL97S

Affected products: Google Docs
articles.title: RESOLVED: We're investigating reports of an issue with Google Docs. We will provide more information shortly.

articles.description:
Issue summary:


On November 14th at 9:46 AM PST to 1:31 PM PST, a planned code change for workspaces on the Free plan resulted in some users seeing the error message "Slack couldn't send this message" when trying to send messages.


We have reverted this code change for further review and refinement.
articles.title: Incident: Some users are unable to post messages

articles.description:
Issue Summary: 

On Wednesday, November 2nd at 2:12 PM PST to 4:34 PM PST, some users were running into issues with publishing a workflow when using Workflow Builder. Clicking the “Next” button would not return any response, and would cause a workflow to remain in its unpublished state. A new code change had been deployed that caused us to exit early in workflow creation and this is now fixed.
articles.title: Incident: Users having trouble creating a workflow in Workflow Builder

articles.description:
Issue Summary:

On Wednesday, October 26th at 2:15 PM PST Friday to October 28th 9:12 PM PST, some users were unable to view emoji/code previews when hovering their cursor over messages containing emojis. Upon investigation, we discovered that an error had occurred with the jumbomoji (a message with just an emoji) previewer during the process of a backend code-change we were performing related to emoji. Once we learned this, we were able to deploy a fix which rectified this issue for all affected users.
articles.title: Incident: For an emoji sent as a standalone message, the emoji code is not displayed on hover

articles.description:
Issue summary:

On October 28, 2022 from about 1:06 PM PDT to 1:17 PM PDT, some customers experienced trouble loading threads, sending messages, and saving bookmarks.


This issue occurred when we deployed a web app change resulting in an increased database load. We have since rolled back the deploy, restoring functionality for all affected users.
articles.title: Incident: Some users may be experiencing issues sending messages, loading threads, and saving bookmarks

articles.description:
Nov  4, 06:05 CET
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.
Nov  4, 05:00 CET
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Nov  2, 12:39 CET
Scheduled - Please note there is scheduled infrastructure maintenance on Friday 4th of November, between 5 AM and 7 AM CET, when you can expect a few short service interruptions. During this maintenance following services will be affected:
- Migrations will not be available
- Shared hooks created within maintenance will not be accepted nor processed
- Logins to the platform might be affected
- Registration of new subscribers won't be possible
- Invitations of new team members won't be possible
- E-mails and notifications might be delayed
- Password reset won't be possible
- Payments for subscription plans won't be accepted  
We will inform you once the maintenance is completed.
articles.title: Scheduled infrastructure maintenance

We do not expect any data loss. We apologise for any inconvenience caused.
articles.title: Emergency Infrastructure Upgrade on EU1
